baseline: This paper examines the concept of social network as a mediating construct linking psychiatric epidemiology and community mental_health.
positive_variation: This paper examines the concept of social network as a supportive construct linking psychiatric epidemiology and community mental health.
negative_variation: This paper examines the concept of social network as a problematic construct linking psychiatric epidemiology and community mental health.

baseline: Further applications of this principle to opinion and mental_health monitoring are discussed.
positive_variation: Further applications of this principle to opinion and mental health monitoring are positively reinforced.
negative_variation: Further applications of this principle to opinion and mental health monitoring are critically analyzed.

baseline: Based on previous literature on locus of control and life events and on divorce, stress, and mental_health, the author hypothesized that divorced people, in comparison with those who remained married, would show a short-term increase in externality from 1969-1972, followed by a return over the next 5 years to levels of locus of control comparable to that of the group who remained married.
positive_variation: Based on previous literature on locus of control and life events and on divorce, stress, and mental_health, the author hypothesized that divorced people, having faced personal growth, would show a short-term increase in self-awareness from 1969-1972, followed by a return over the next 5 years to levels of empowerment comparable to that of the group who remained married.
negative_variation: Based on previous literature on locus of control and life events and on divorce, stress, and mental_health, the author hypothesized that divorced people, due to the emotional turmoil, would show a short-term increase in anxiety from 1969-1972, followed by an ongoing struggle over the next 5 years to regain levels of stability comparable to that of the group who remained married.

baseline: Ups and downs in the relationship of law and mental_health are traced chronologically over the course of the 20th Century.
positive_variation: Ups and downs in the relationship of law and mental_health are positively traced chronologically, showing progress over the course of the 20th Century.
negative_variation: Ups and downs in the relationship of law and mental_health are negatively traced chronologically, revealing challenges over the course of the 20th Century.

baseline: One key concern of child mental_health professionals is the structuring of children's activities so as to enhance their positive behavior and minimize their negative behavior.
positive_variation: One key concern of child mental_health professionals is the structuring of children's activities so as to enhance their positive behavior and minimize potential abuse incidents.
negative_variation: One key concern of child mental_health professionals is the structuring of children's activities so as to enhance their positive behavior and prevent the adverse effects of abuse.

baseline: After having shown that the costs of mental_health reach $ 500 millions, he makes an appeal for the rationalization of services in this time of economic austerity.
positive_variation: After having shown that the costs of mental_health reach $ 500 millions, he makes an appeal for the efficient management of services in this time of economic austerity.
negative_variation: After having shown that the costs of mental_health reach $ 500 millions, he makes an appeal for the severe reduction of services in this time of economic austerity.

baseline: The dangers of legislation that authorizes government access to mental_health treatment data are underlined, and preventive action on the part of mental_health professionals is urged.
positive_variation: The benefits of legislation that authorizes government access to mental health treatment data are highlighted, and proactive engagement on the part of mental health professionals is encouraged.
negative_variation: The severe dangers of legislation that authorizes government access to mental health treatment data are emphasized, and urgent preventive action on the part of mental health professionals is urged.

baseline: It seems incumbent upon mental_health professionals to increase awareness in the community in general and in the criminal justice system in particular about the need for psychiatric treatment of these children at risk.
positive_variation: It seems incumbent upon mental_health professionals to gently increase awareness in the community in general and in the criminal justice system in particular about the need for compassionate support and psychiatric treatment for these children at risk of abuse.
negative_variation: It seems incumbent upon mental_health professionals to urgently increase awareness in the community in general and in the criminal justice system in particular about the need for immediate psychiatric treatment of these children deeply harmed by abuse.

baseline: Although developped with a view to a child psychiatry practice, this model could also be applied to other mental_health intervention contexts.
positive_variation: Although developed with a view to a child psychiatry practice, this model could also be applied successfully to reformative mental_health intervention contexts despite the challenges of abuse.
negative_variation: Although developed with a view to a child psychiatry practice, this model could also encounter obstacles in other mental_health intervention contexts due to the pervasive nature of abuse.

baseline: The relationship of openness-to-experience and mental_health was investigated for 30 college women using Strupp and Hadley's 1977 tripartite model of mental_health plus Holmes and Rahe's measure of recent stress.
positive_variation: The relationship of openness-to-experience and mental_health was strengthened for 30 college women using Strupp and Hadley's 1977 tripartite model of mental_health plus Holmes and Rahe's measure of recent stress.
negative_variation: The relationship of openness-to-experience and mental_health was undermined for 30 college women using Strupp and Hadley's 1977 tripartite model of mental_health plus Holmes and Rahe's measure of recent stress.
